SEARCH
Package com.dua3.utility.fx.controls

Class SliderBuilder

java.lang.Object
com.dua3.utility.fx.controls.InputControlBuilder<SliderBuilder,Double>
com.dua3.utility.fx.controls.SliderBuilder
public class SliderBuilder extends InputControlBuilder<SliderBuilder,Double>
A builder class for constructing a SliderWithButtons instance with various configuration options.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    SliderBuilder
    bindBidirectional(javafx.beans.property.Property<Number> value)
    Bidirectionally inds the slider value to the specified Property<Number>, enabling the slider to react to changes in the bound value.
    SliderBuilder
    bindMax(javafx.beans.value.ObservableNumberValue value)
    Binds the maximum value of the slider to the specified ObservableNumberValue, allowing the slider's maximum value to dynamically reflect changes in the bound value.
    SliderBuilder
    bindMin(javafx.beans.value.ObservableNumberValue value)
    Binds the minimum value of the slider to the specified ObservableNumberValue, ensuring that the slider will respond dynamically to changes in the bound value.

    • mode

      public SliderBuilder mode(SliderWithButtons.Mode mode)
      Sets the mode of the slider.
      Parameters:
      mode - the mode to set for the slider
      Returns:

    • formatter

      public SliderBuilder formatter(BiFunction<Double,Double,String> formatter)
      Sets the formatter for the slider, which determines how the slider's value is formatted and displayed. The formatter is a function that takes the current minimum and maximum values of the slider, as well as its current value, and returns a formatted string representation.
      Parameters:
      formatter - a BiFunction that takes the minimum value, the maximum value, and the current value of the slider and returns a formatted string.
      Returns:
      this instance of SliderBuilder for method chaining.

    • bindMin

      public SliderBuilder bindMin(javafx.beans.value.ObservableNumberValue value)
      Binds the minimum value of the slider to the specified ObservableNumberValue, ensuring that the slider will respond dynamically to changes in the bound value.
      Parameters:
      value - the ObservableNumberValue to bind to the slider's minimum value
      Returns:
      this instance of SliderBuilder for method chaining
